Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Relates to restrictions on political contributions by lobbyists
Summary: Restricts form, amount and time of political contributions by lobbyists and the acceptance of such contributions by public officials.
LawCode: Ren §§1-u & 1-v to be §§1-w & 1-x, add §§1-u & 1-v, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to restrictions on political contributions from lobbyists
